EmailTemplate.name: 2020.09.01 -BS - Show Tech Stock.Tech Stock
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Real-Time Technology Inventory Levels
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Simplify Your Technology Procurement We’ve recently made it easier for your business to view our national inventory levels. Organizations will now benefit from a more transparent view of what items are in inventory and ready for immediate shipment to your business, on our Product Detail page. Procurement can now manage multiple delivery locations with inventory visibility local to your place of business. Organizations can simply contact our technology sales team for assistance when placing an order outside of their region. Backordered items are now displayed and will be fulfilled as soon as inventory becomes available at one of our multiple distribution centres. We are here to support your procurement requirements. Should you have any questions or require support on our enhancements, simply click ‘Get in touch with a tech specialist’ for quick access to our phone number and email. Shop Technology Now! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Technology/_/N-86f?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
